abstract: Joris Mathijsen (Dutch pronunciation: [ˈjɔː.rɪs ma.ˈtɛi̯.sə(n)]; born 5 April 1980 in Goirle, North Brabant) is a Dutch footballer who plays for Feyenoord and the Netherlands national football team.
